name: worm farm
description:
A remake/update of a scratch game I made a long time ago

Click to drag worms

Hover your mouse over worms to see their names

Press N with your mouse hovering over a worm to name it something stupid

FEATURES:

- Exponential worm growth (soon you will have too many)

- Worm classes (can you find the legendary top hat worm??)

- Worms make funny sounds and sometimes sing (a cacophony will soon ring out in the ears of millions)

- Drag worms around (but they will always go back to their pen)

I used the same audio from the original version, but added the naming feature and worm classes.

IDEAS:

Study worms' behavior and document it

Have a worm race by dragging two out and seeing which goes back in faster

Screenshot your worms and send them to people without context
